summary: A romantic/special website featuring interactive heart-shaped notes that users can click or interact with.
known_issues: Messages/notes displayed at the bottom of the site are not readable (text visibility/contrast issue)

existing_features.title: Design and apply a romantic visual theme throughout the entire site: warm rose and blush color palette, elegant serif typography for headings, soft petal/floral decorative accents, gentle ambient animations (e.g., floating particles), and a centered full-screen hero layout. Enforce this style consistently on all pages and components.
Display an array of animated, floating heart icons scattered across the screen. Each heart should gently float, pulse, or drift to create a lively and romantic atmosphere.

Make each heart icon interactive: when a user clicks or taps a heart, it opens a small popover or modal card that reveals a personal note message. Each heart is linked to a unique note. Clicking outside the card or pressing a close button dismisses it.

Provide a simple admin-style section (e.g., accessible via a hidden button or small icon) where the creator can add a new heart note by typing a message and clicking 'Add Heart'. The new heart should appear on the canvas and its note should be persisted via the backend.
Generate and use a decorative hero banner image and a heart icon illustration as static assets for the site.

Add a visible personal message or greeting text area in the hero section of the site where the creator can display a custom message to visitors. The message should be editable via the existing admin-style section and persisted in the backend, then rendered prominently on the main page in the romantic visual style.

Fix the text visibility and contrast issue for heart note messages/NoteCard popups displayed at the bottom of the site. Ensure the note text, creator name, and date are clearly readable against their background in all positions on the canvas, applying sufficient contrast ratios and appropriate text color overrides so the romantic styling does not obscure legibility.

new_feature_requests.summary: Interactive heart elements that open or reveal personal notes when clicked
Visually romantic/special themed website design with hearts

Store the collection of heart notes (position, message, and any metadata) in the backend so they are persisted and retrievable. Expose query and update functions to read all notes and add or edit a note.
